## gatewayd config lint

Lint the GatewayD global config

```
gatewayd config lint [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --config string   Global config file (default "gatewayd.yaml")
  -h, --help            help for lint
      --sentry          Enable Sentry (default true)
```
